name: daily-scrape
on:
  schedule:
    - cron: '0 4 * * *'   # запускается каждый день в 04:00 UTC (прим.: GitHub Actions использует UTC)
  workflow_dispatch:     # позволяет запускать вручную

jobs:
  run:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - name: Checkout repository
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Set up Python
        uses: actions/setup-python@v4
        with:
          python-version: '3.11'

      - name: Install dependencies
        run: |
          python -m pip install --upgrade pip
          pip install -r requirements.txt

      - name: Check env vars exist
        run: |
          python - <<'PY'
import os, sys
for name in ("SUPABASE_URL","SUPABASE_KEY","SUPABASE_BUCKET"):
    if not os.environ.get(name):
        print(f"ERROR: {name} not set")
        sys.exit(1)
print("All secrets present")
PY
        env:
          SUPABASE_URL: ${{ secrets.SUPABASE_URL }}
          SUPABASE_KEY: ${{ secrets.SUPABASE_KEY }}
          SUPABASE_BUCKET: ${{ secrets.SUPABASE_BUCKET }}

      - name: Run scraper
        env:
          SUPABASE_URL: ${{ secrets.SUPABASE_URL }}
          SUPABASE_KEY: ${{ secrets.SUPABASE_KEY }}
          SUPABASE_BUCKET: ${{ secrets.SUPABASE_BUCKET }}
          TARGET_BASE_URL: ${{ secrets.TARGET_BASE_URL }} # опционально, добавьте как секрет, если хотите
        run: python scraper.py

      - name: Run pricing
        env:
          SUPABASE_URL: ${{ secrets.SUPABASE_URL }}
          SUPABASE_KEY: ${{ secrets.SUPABASE_KEY }}
        run: python pricing.py
